definition: (coll.) country folk/rustic/see also 鄉下人|乡下人[xiang1 xia4 ren2]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: She took the country bumpkin shopping.
sentences.chinese: 她帶着阿鄉買東西去了。

sentences.english: In my small, even the vegetable farmers in Shanghai suburbs, we all shout Ah Heung.
sentences.chinese: 在我小的時候，連上海郊區的菜農，我們都喊阿鄉。
